# Header Component with Acutrack Logos

The Acutrack Design System includes built-in Acutrack logos that are automatically bundled and available when using the Header component.

## üéØ Quick Start

The Header component now includes default Acutrack logos out of the box. Simply import and use the Header component without any additional configuration:

```tsx
import { Header } from '@acutrack-bookprint/acutrack-ds';

function App() {
  return (
    <Header
      hasSearch={true}
      searchPlaceholder="Search..."
      onSearch={(query) => console.log('Search:', query)}
      variant="website"
      size="md"
    />
  );
}
```

## üì¶ Available Logo Assets

The design system includes the following logo assets:

### Logo URLs
```tsx
import { 
  ACUTRACK_LOGO_LIGHT,
  ACUTRACK_LOGO_DARK,
  ACUTRACK_LOGO_ICON_LIGHT,
  ACUTRACK_LOGO_ICON_DARK,
  LOGO_URLS
} from '@acutrack-bookprint/acutrack-ds';

// LOGO_URLS provides organized access:
// LOGO_URLS.light.full - Full light logo
// LOGO_URLS.light.icon - Icon light logo
// LOGO_URLS.dark.full - Full dark logo
// LOGO_URLS.dark.icon - Icon dark logo
```

### Default Logo Configurations
```tsx
import { DEFAULT_LOGOS, DEFAULT_LOGO_CONFIGS } from '@acutrack-bookprint/acutrack-ds';

// DEFAULT_LOGOS.light - Light theme logo config
// DEFAULT_LOGOS.dark - Dark theme logo config
// DEFAULT_LOGOS.iconOnly - Icon-only logo config
```

## üé® Usage Examples

### 1. Default Header (Recommended)
```tsx
import { Header } from '@acutrack-bookprint/acutrack-ds';

<Header
  // Uses DEFAULT_LOGOS.light automatically
  hasSearch={true}
  onSearch={handleSearch}
  variant="website"
/>
```

### 2. Header with Dark Theme Logo
```tsx
import { Header, DEFAULT_LOGOS } from '@acutrack-bookprint/acutrack-ds';

<Header
  logo={DEFAULT_LOGOS.dark}
  variant="dashboard"
  theme="dark"
/>
```

### 3. Header with Icon-Only Logo
```tsx
import { Header, DEFAULT_LOGOS } from '@acutrack-bookprint/acutrack-ds';

<Header
  logo={DEFAULT_LOGOS.iconOnly}
  variant="minimal"
/>
```

### 4. Header with Custom Logo
```tsx
import { Header, ACUTRACK_LOGO_LIGHT } from '@acutrack-bookprint/acutrack-ds';

<Header
  logo={{
    text: "My Company",
    href: "/",
    isClickable: true,
    src: ACUTRACK_LOGO_LIGHT, // Use Acutrack logo as base
    iconSrc: ACUTRACK_LOGO_ICON_LIGHT,
    show: true,
    useIconOnMobile: true
  }}
/>
```

### 5. Header with Custom Branding
```tsx
import { Header } from '@acutrack-bookprint/acutrack-ds';

<Header
  logo={{
    text: "Your Brand",
    href: "/",
    isClickable: true,
    show: true
    // No src/iconSrc = will display text logo
  }}
/>
```

## üöÄ Example Components

The design system includes ready-to-use example components:

```tsx
import { 
  HeaderExample, 
  HeaderWithCustomLogo, 
  HeaderWithDarkLogo 
} from '@acutrack-bookprint/acutrack-ds';

// Basic example with default logos
<HeaderExample />

// Example with custom logo
<HeaderWithCustomLogo />

// Example with dark theme logo
<HeaderWithDarkLogo />
```

## üì± Responsive Behavior

The Header component automatically handles logo display across different screen sizes:

- **Desktop**: Shows full logo (if `src` is provided)
- **Mobile**: Shows icon logo (if `iconSrc` is provided)
- **Fallback**: Shows text logo if images fail to load

## üéØ Logo Configuration Options

```tsx
interface LogoConfig {
  src?: string;           // Full logo URL
  iconSrc?: string;       // Icon logo URL
  text?: string;          // Text to display as logo
  href?: string;          // Link destination
  isClickable?: boolean;  // Whether logo is clickable
  show?: boolean;         // Whether to show logo
  useIconOnMobile?: boolean; // Use icon on mobile
  className?: string;     // Additional CSS classes
}
```

## üîß Build Integration

The logos are automatically included in the build process:

1. **SVG Assets**: All logo SVG files are bundled as assets
2. **URL Generation**: Vite generates proper URLs for the logos
3. **Type Safety**: Full TypeScript support for logo configurations
4. **Tree Shaking**: Only used logos are included in the final bundle

## üé® Theme Integration

The logos work seamlessly with the design system's theming:

```tsx
// Light theme (default)
<Header logo={DEFAULT_LOGOS.light} />

// Dark theme
<Header logo={DEFAULT_LOGOS.dark} theme="dark" />

// Auto theme switching
<Header 
  logo={DEFAULT_LOGOS.light} 
  hasThemeToggle={true} 
/>
```

## üö® Error Handling

The Header component includes robust error handling for logo loading:

- **Fallback to Icon**: If full logo fails, tries icon logo
- **Fallback to Text**: If all images fail, shows text logo
- **Console Warnings**: Logs errors for debugging
- **Graceful Degradation**: Component continues to work even if logos fail

## üì¶ Package Contents

When you install the Acutrack Design System, you get:

- ‚úÖ All Acutrack logo assets (SVG)
- ‚úÖ Pre-configured logo objects
- ‚úÖ TypeScript definitions
- ‚úÖ Example components
- ‚úÖ Responsive behavior
- ‚úÖ Theme integration
- ‚úÖ Error handling

## üëÅÔ∏è Logo Visibility Control

Developers have complete control over logo visibility with multiple options:

### 1. Hide Logo Completely
```tsx
<Header 
  logo={{ show: false }}  // Completely hides the logo
  hasSearch={true}
  variant="dashboard"
/>
```

### 2. Conditional Logo Display
```tsx
<Header 
  logo={userRole === 'admin' ? DEFAULT_LOGOS.light : { show: false }}
  hasSearch={true}
  variant="dashboard"
/>
```

### 3. Text-Only Logo
```tsx
<Header 
  logo={{
    text: "My App",  // Only text, no images
    href: "/",
    show: true
  }}
  variant="website"
/>
```

### 4. Responsive Logo Visibility
```tsx
<Header 
  logo={{
    ...DEFAULT_LOGOS.light,
    className: "hidden md:block"  // Hide on mobile, show on desktop
  }}
  variant="dashboard"
/>
```

### 5. CSS-Based Hiding
```tsx
<Header 
  logo={{
    ...DEFAULT_LOGOS.light,
    className: "opacity-0 pointer-events-none"  // Hide with CSS
  }}
  variant="dashboard"
/>
```

### 6. Role-Based Logo Display
```tsx
const shouldShowLogo = userRole !== 'guest';
<Header 
  logo={shouldShowLogo ? DEFAULT_LOGOS.light : { show: false }}
  hasSearch={true}
  variant="dashboard"
/>
```

## üéØ Best Practices

1. **Use Default Logos**: Start with `DEFAULT_LOGOS.light` for consistency
2. **Theme Awareness**: Use appropriate logo for light/dark themes
3. **Mobile First**: Ensure `iconSrc` is provided for mobile experience
4. **Fallback Text**: Always provide `text` as a fallback
5. **Accessibility**: Include proper `alt` text and `aria-label`
6. **Visibility Control**: Use `show: false` to hide logos when needed
7. **Conditional Display**: Implement role-based or state-based logo visibility

## üîó Related Components

- `Header` - Main header component
- `ThemeToggle` - Theme switching component
- `Sidebar` - Navigation sidebar with logo support
- `Layout` - Layout components with header integration

---

**Note**: The logos are automatically bundled with the design system. No additional setup or configuration is required to use them.
